Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Six Ecossaises, D 421

1816

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 3'

  • 1. A-flat major
  • 2. A-flat major
  • 3. E-flat major
  • 4. B-flat major
  • 5. E-flat major
  • 6. A-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/6 · BA 5529 · Tänze I · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Henle · HN 76 · Sämtliche Tänze / Band II · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50022 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 2 · ed. Alexander Weinmann

1. A-flat major

A version of this dance is also used as the fifth ecossaise of the twelve waltzes, seventeen Ländler and nine ecossaises (D 145).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. A-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

3. E-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

4. B-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

5. E-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

6. A-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2
